com.ooyala.android
Interface OoyalaPlayerControls

public interface OoyalaPlayerControls

Method Summary
 void hide()
          Hide these controls (make all controls invisible/transparent)
 void setOoyalaPlayer(OoyalaPlayer player)
          Set the OoyalaPlayer that these controls will control.
 void setParentLayout(OoyalaPlayerLayout layout)
          Set the parent layout that these controls should show on top of.
 void show()
          Show these controls (make all controls visible)
 

Method Detail

setParentLayout

void setParentLayout(OoyalaPlayerLayout layout)
Set the parent layout that these controls should show on top of. This method should add the controls to this layout in the correct positions (but they should not actually be visible)

Parameters:
layout - the layout that these controls should show on top of

setOoyalaPlayer

void setOoyalaPlayer(OoyalaPlayer player)
Set the OoyalaPlayer that these controls will control.

Parameters:
player - the player to control

show

void show()
Show these controls (make all controls visible)

hide

void hide()
Hide these controls (make all controls invisible/transparent)
